arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic 'did it right for Darren Orme', says Ryan Lowe
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe said he hoped Wigan Athletic had 'done it right' in terms of honouring the memory of superfan Darren Orme on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic and Barnsley bosses differ in views on red card rumpus - 'Without getting myself into trouble...'
arts.sum: Opposition managers Ryan Lowe and Conor Hourihane unsurprisingly had differing views of the controversial red card row towards the end of Wigan Athletic's 1-1 draw against Barnsley.

arts.ttl: Ryan Lowe assesses Wigan Athletic's draw against Barnsley - 'Full of intent'
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe felt his Wigan Athletic side were unfortunate not to take all three points against Barnsley, after putting in a ‘fantastic performance’ that was ‘full of intent’.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic 1 Barnsley 1: Maleace Asamoah Jnr makes point for Ryan Lowe
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe marked his first home game in charge of Wigan Athletic with a 1-1 draw against Barnsley in Sky Bet League One.

arts.ttl: Ryan Lowe earns point from first home Wigan game after draw with Barnsley
arts.sum: Maleace Asamoah cancelled out Davis Keillor-Dunn’s early opener.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: How many changes in our expected team v Barnsley?
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who new head coach Ryan Lowe will select to start against Barnsley on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic starlet James Carragher on coming home with two Malta caps - and Poland legend Robert Lewandowski's shirt!
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic starlet James Carragher did more than come home from the international break with two caps for Malta - he also made sure he returned with a shirt from one of the best players of his generation!

arts.ttl: Darren Orme: Fund-raiser to help family with funeral for Wigan Athletic fan
arts.sum: A fund-raising page has been set up to help raise money for Darren Orme’s funeral.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss gives injury update on walking wounded
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe has provided an update on his Wigan Athletic walking wounded ahead of the final block of fixtures.

arts.ttl: Blackpool expected to release Wigan Athletic and Mansfield Town loan pair this summer
arts.sum: Blackpool pair Ollie Norburn and Jordan Rhodes are both ‘expected’ to leave permanently this summer, as detailed in… The post Blackpool expected to release Wigan Athletic and Mansfield Town loan pair this summer appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
